summary: A reclusive man sets out for justice and redemption when three troublesome teens kill his dog for no good reason.
cast: Brian Cox|Noel Fisher|Kyle Gallner|Shiloh Fernandez|Kim Dickens|Marcia Bennett|Richard Riehle|Tom Sizemore|Ashley Laurence|Robert Englund|Amanda Plummer|Keith Buterbaugh|Jack Ketchum|Delaney Williams|Tate Ellington|Greg Stuhr|John-Luke Montias|Katie Piel|Lauren Birkell|Kacee DeMasi|Tom Gambrill|Jesse Hlubik|Orion McCabe|Ivana Shein|John Smith
keywords: animal character name as title|dog|killing an animal|revenge|color in title
director: Directors: Trygve Allister Diesen, Lucky McKee
title: Red (Debieron decir la verdad...)
